name: 4chan
effects: All discord mods don't untap during their next untap step

name: Reddit
effects: All rolls are made at a disadvantage

name: Political Ideologies
description: Controversies related to various political ideologies, policies, and elections that often lead to clashes between liberals, conservatives, libertarians, and other political groups.

name: Religious Freedom
description: Debates and conflicts related to issues concerning religious freedom, separation of church and state, and moral values.

name: Racial Inequality
description: Controversies surrounding racial inequality, racial profiling, and cultural appropriation within American society.

name: LGBTQ+ Rights
description: Ongoing battles for LGBTQ+ rights, gender equality, and debates around reproductive rights.

name: Generational Differences
description: Conflicts between Baby Boomers, Generation X, Millennials, and Generation Z on issues like technology, work ethics, and social norms.

name: Income Inequality
description: Contentious debates over income inequality, access to education and healthcare, and taxation policies.

name: Technology in Society
description: Concerns about privacy, online harassment, and the role of technology in society as sources of division.

name: Representation in Video Games
description: Disagreements over representation in video games, gatekeeping, and controversies within online gaming communities.

name: Culinary Choices
description: Debates over dietary choices, food sourcing, and cultural appropriation in the culinary world as sources of contention.

name: Climate Change
description: Disagreements over climate change, conservation efforts, and environmental policies as sources of conflict.

name: Music Genres
description: Controversies related to music genres, subcultures (e.g., punk, hip-hop), and controversies within the music industry.

name: Sports Rivalries
description: Rivalries between sports teams' fanbases and debates over athlete activism as sources of conflict.

name: Artistic Freedom
description: Issues like censorship, artistic freedom, and cultural appropriation in the world of art and entertainment as sources of division.

name: Academic Freedom
description: Debates over curriculum content, campus politics, and academic freedom as sources of conflict within education.

name: Healthcare Policies
description: Contentious controversies related to healthcare policies, access, and debates over healthcare reform.

name: Meth Barrens of New Jersey
description: a place as barren as the souls of the people who live there
effects: always roll 3 dice and choose the middle result
